title: cyber_attack
description: A coordinated phishing and ransomware attack targets staff systems.

timeline.title: Suspicious Activity Detected
timeline.description: Multiple users report a fake payroll email with embedded links. Do not click any links.

timeline.title: Credential Compromise
timeline.description: Security detects logins from unusual locations. Reset passwords for affected accounts immediately.

timeline.title: System Isolation Required
timeline.description: Ransomware detected on workstation. Isolate affected systems from network to prevent spread.

timeline.title: Backup Verification
timeline.description: Critical files encrypted in shared drives. Verify backup integrity and offline backup status.

timeline.title: Incident Response Team Activation
timeline.description: Activate cybersecurity incident response team. Document all affected systems and begin forensics.

timeline.title: Recovery Initiation
timeline.description: Containment successful. Begin restoration from verified backups. Monitor for additional threats.

timeline.title: Post-Incident Review
timeline.description: Systems restored. Conduct lessons learned session and update security protocols.
